title: Just For You, Sir
description:
Since losing his wife, Derrick hadn’t been interested in another relationship. But he was growing bored playing with a different sub each weekend. He needed something more.  On the run from an abusive husband, the last thing Jacey wanted was a man. Yet, there was something about Derrick that drew her in, that made her imagine impossible things…  Like having him touch her, taste her, take her.  
Contains: BDSM, spanking and hot, hot sex.
author: Laylah Roberts
